game.title: The Missing Scepter
game.description: The King's Scepter has been stolen and the kingdom is in chaos. Find the missing scepter and return it to the King.
game.reward: The King's favor, a bag of gold, and the title of "Savior of the Kingdom".

task.description: The Royal Archivist has historical records related to the theft. Talk to her to start your investigation.

task.objective: Examine the broken crown for clues.
task.description: The stolen scepter might be connected to a broken crown. Search the castle for it.
